name: Jungle Explorer (Monkey_Niples, WillemH)
description:
Hello fellow Jammers!

Welcome to our top-down puzzle game Jungle Explorer.

Important note: We recommend playing the game in fullscreen mode (after hitting the "Run game" button click the blue icon in the bottom right corner).

Controls How to Play

The games mechanic and goal is fairly simple - find and capture the sheep.

Press 'M' to open the map, you'll need it in order to solve the complex levels.

Collect maps to unlock new areas

Our Team 

                       Robbe                                                Willem
